column3: looks like sugar granules.Or concentrated vinegar.Cement needs a high ph to bind properly.So if you add acid
column4: it won‚Äôt properly set and/or needs 3-4 times longer.  Speaking as someone who works in the concrete forming industry: the easiest way to severely fuck up any large concrete pour is to delay it at the wrong moment. If someone is trying to build a huge fuckoff concrete thing - say
column6: a giant wall - they‚Äôre going to need an obscene quantity of concrete
column7: and that‚Äôs all going to have to be transported there from the nearest mixing plant. This means they‚Äôll have multiple trucks coming by to decant concrete in consecutive pours while the workers place it and vibrate it to ensure it all intermixes and sets properly
column8: forming a monolithic mass. If one pour is allowed to set before the next one is added
column11: possibly structurally unsound gap between the two called a ‚Äúcold joint.‚Äù A bad enough cold joint can completely fuck your whole project because the next engineer or inspector who sets foot on that site is going to take one look at that motherfucker and immediately embark on a quest for blood vengeance. You will literally have to cut that whole section of wall out
column12: slap some dowels in the nearest structurally sound bits
column13: and re-form and pour the offending segment from scratch
column14: which represents a fortune in cost overruns and will make everyone involved very upset. This is an especially bad problem in hot climates
column15: because the concrete curing process is exothermic - that stuff sets much faster when it‚Äôs really hot out
column16: and its 28-day compressive strength tends to be poorer as well. So if
column18: you wanted to completely shit up a wannabe dictator‚Äôs enormous unfeasible poured concrete vanity project
column19: you could literally just randomly hassle and delay every concrete truck on its way there. Dude‚Äôs gonna end up with a giant worthless pile of shitty crumbling concrete and exposed reinforcing steel
column20: and an army of pissed-off contractors to boot.  reblogging for purely educational purposes nothing more " False text

column13: DC. Nannie Helen Burroughs (1879-1961) ‚ÄúWhen the ballot is put into the hands of the American woman the world is going to get a correct estimate of the Negro woman. It will find her a tower of strength of which poets have never sung

column17: Nannie Helen Burroughs devoted her life to empowering black women. ¬†Burroughs helped establish the National Association of Colored Women in 1896 and founded the National Training School for Women and Girls in Washington
column18: DC in 1909. ¬†She was outspoken on issues she considered important to African American interests and wrote many articles for leading African American newspapers and magazines. ¬†She used these articles to attack injustices endured by African Americans and encourage readers to take responsibility for changing their own conditions. ¬† Daisy Elizabeth Adams Lampkin (1884-1965) ""You cannot be neutral. You must either join with us who believe in the bright future or be destroyed by those who would return us to the dark past.‚Äù Daisy Elizabeth Adams Lampkin dedicated her life to supporting women‚Äôs and civil rights. ¬†Lampkin began hosting local suffragette meetings at her home near Pittsburgh and organizing African American women to engage in consumer groups in 1912. ¬†Much of her efforts centered on the organization of women‚Äôs groups and her leadership earned her the position of president of the Lucy Stone Woman Suffrage League in 1915. column5: and what happens to them is crucial to the theme
column6: structure and plot of the book
column8: many books are ‚Äúfeminist.‚Äù Why interesting and important? Because women are interesting and important in real life. They are not an afterthought of nature
column9: they are not secondary players in human destiny
column10: and every society has always known that. Without women capable of giving birth

column13: and of other campaigns meant to subdue and exploit a population. Kill their babies and replace their babies with yours
column14: as cats do; make women have babies they can‚Äôt afford to raise
column15: or babies you will then remove from them for your own purposes
column16: steal babies - it‚Äôs been a widespread

column18: ‚Äù slavery and its ever-renewed human merchandise ‚Äî they both fit in here. Of those promoting enforced childbirth
